com.flurry.android

Interface FlurryAdListener


  • public interface FlurryAdListener
    Provides all available methods for the FlurryAdListener interface. For additional information on how to use Flurry's Ads SDK to attract high-quality users and monetize your user base see Support Center - AppCircle.
    See Also:
    Flurry Publisher Support Site

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdClicked(String adSpace)
      Invoked when an ad is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldDisplayAd

        boolean shouldDisplayAd(String adSpace,
                        FlurryAdType type)
        Invoked when an ad will display on the specified @c adSpace. This method informs the app that an ad will display to the user. You can use this to pause app states. You can also decide not to show this ad by simply returning @c false.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        type - The type of ad to be displayed. See @c FlurryAdType for allowable values.
        Returns:
        true if the ad should be displayed, false if not
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onAdClosed

        void onAdClosed(String adSpace)
        Invoked when the ad has been removed.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        This method informs the app that an ad has closed. You can use this to resume app states.

      • onApplicationExit

        void onApplicationExit(String adSpace)
        Invoked when the ad has been selected that will take the user out of the app. This method informs the app that an ad has been clicked and the user is about to be taken outside the app.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onRendered

        void onRendered(String adSpace)
        Invoked when an ad is rendered. This method informs the user an ad was rendered.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.3.0

      • onRenderFailed

        void onRenderFailed(String adSpace)
        Invoked when an ad fails to render. This method informs the user an ad was retrieved, however, was unsuccessful in displaying to the user (could be lost network connectivity for example).
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • spaceDidReceiveAd

        void spaceDidReceiveAd(String adSpace)
        Invoked when ad was retrieved. This method informs the user that ads have been received from the server and stored locally for this ad space.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • spaceDidFailToReceiveAd

        void spaceDidFailToReceiveAd(String adSpace)
        Invoked when ad retrieval fails. This method informs the user that ads were requested from the server but none were stored locally for this ad space
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.5

      • onAdClicked

        void onAdClicked(String adSpace)
        Invoked when an ad is clicked. This method informs the user that an ad was clicked.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.5

      • onAdOpened

        void onAdOpened(String adSpace)
        Invoked when an ad is opened. This method informs the user that an ad was opened.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.0.5

      • onVideoCompleted

        void onVideoCompleted(String adSpace)
        Invoked when video viewing is completed. This method informs the user that video viewing has completed. The app can check the server for the rewards, if this is the rewarded ad space.
        Parameters:
        adSpace - The placement of an ad in your app, where placement may be splash screen for SPLASH_AD.
        Since:
        3.1.1
